description: Adjust car speed. Parameter: Desired speed.
prompts: Let's go a little faster.
Slow down the car a bit, please.
Maintain the speed of 65 mph.
I'd like to go 55 mph.
Keep the speed at 70 mph.

description: Initiate autonomous parking. Parameter: Parking spot coordinates.
prompts: Find a parking spot near the entrance.
Park me in that open space over there.
Park right next to that red car.
I'd like to park in the lot behind the building.

description: Set navigation destination. Parameter: Destination coordinates.
prompts: Take me to the library downtown.
Navigate to the airport, please.
I need to go to the grocery store on Main Street.
Can you get me to the park?
Let's go to the restaurant on 5th Avenue.

description: Summon car to location. Parameter: Target location coordinates.
prompts: Come pick me up at the front door.
Bring the car to the corner of Elm and Oak.
I need the car at the parking garage entrance.
Summon the vehicle to my current location.
Can you meet me at the cafe across the street?

description: Check tire pressure. Parameter: Tire pressure.
prompts: What's the tire pressure?
Check the tire pressure, please.
Are the tires inflated correctly?

How are the tires doing?
Open the windows.

Close the windows, please.

Lock the doors.
Unlock the doors, please.
Make sure the doors are locked.

description: Adjust temperature settings. Parameter: Desired temperature.
prompts: Make it warmer in here.
Set the temperature to 72 degrees.

I need the car to be running.

Open the trunk.

description: Set audio volume. Parameter: Volume level.
prompts: Make it louder.

Switch off the parking sensors, please.

prompts: Make the headlights brighter.
